findings.title: PAUSER_ROLE privileged role
findings.description: Privileged roles are not carefully set with the _paused variable and are not managed using time locks and multiple signatures.

findings.title: DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE privileged role
findings.description: The DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE privileged role should be carefully set up with the PAUSER_ROLE privileged role and managed using time locks and multiple signatures.
